Summary: Lookedlike giant burning lights on the horizon ahead of me. i was driving towards it on the highway
divs: Sighting DetailsBrightest light in the sky look like it was buring. i was driving towards the object on hgihway 95 in Rhode Island around exit 5 and 3. As i became closer light appeard to be in analmost triangular with 3 very bright on the front edge. Also what appeard to be a blinking light object seemed dense as well not just orbs of light. It was either hovering or moving very slowly very low in the sky as weell roghtly 300 feet. Could not readily identify the object at all.
